Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Gamma in Milan (Citta Studi), you'll be close to Piscina Romano Ponzio and Cathedral of Milan. This hotel is within close proximity of Istituto Besta and Orto Botanico di Cascina Rosa.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 58 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include wireless Internet access (surcharge) and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. This hotel has 2 meeting rooms available for events. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Istituto Besta - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Orto Botanico di Cascina Rosa - 1 km / 0.6 mi

Parco Marinai d'Italia - 3 km / 1.8 mi
Natural Science Museum - 3 km / 1.9 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Gamma is Milan (LIN-Linate) - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Hotel Gamma are:
Milan (LIN-Linate) - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Milan (MXP-Malpensa Intl.) - 43.8 km / 27.2 mi
